response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your business with our product.", "product_price": 9500}
